HEADER.Title: Retrive VARA key from selected value

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PRV.VARA.IP_OPERATION_STATE,,"&UC4RB_OPS_VARA_VALUE#") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &UC4RB_OPS_VARA_VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &FLAG# =1 :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# !---Print key is value exists :IF &FLAG# EQ 1 : PRINT "&UC4RB_OPS_VARA_VALUE#" :ELSE : PRINT "No Key exists for &UC4RB_OPS_VARA_VALUE#" :ENDIF
